website_summaries.verdict: This measuring wheel is a solid option if you're going to be using it frequently and need something that will hold up well over time.
pros: Magnifying lens makes it easy to read the counter
Reset button built into the handle
cons: The unit tends to lean toward the side of the counter during use

customer_reviews.title: This metric measuring wheel NOT worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: This metric measuring wheel was ordered along with two other brands to see which one would work best for classroom kits. This was the most expensive of the three I ordered and quit working within the first 30 minutes. Komelon and Rolatape worked much better and were easier to use and pack. IMPORTANT: Once you insert the main bottom handle of the Keson RR3M you CANNOT remove it. IT IS PERMANENT! I'm sending this back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie James Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Non measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: Totally dissatisfied with this measuring wheel. I bought this back in Sept. when I received the measuring wheel it was DOA. Contacted Amazon who immediately issued a replacement. After receiving the new wheel I only used it a couple of times before storing for off season. Got it out recently and have problems with it on my jobs, seven times out of ten the counter will not count after a reset. Not certain if wheel even measures accurately with these counter issues. The quality of this measuring wheel is sub standard compared to other measuring wheels I have owned and used.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on time. Product arrived assembled and ready ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Product arrived assembled and ready for use. I walked with the unit on level ground and within 35 meters the counter stopped working. I reset the device and it continued to randomly stop counting between 25-300 meters. The extension holds do not keep the handle fully extended and over time the handle slips back down to the original position. This product was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me! No problems at all and very happy with my purchase!!! Can't beat the price or the warranty! Extends open and locks tight, I tried 4 times 100ft and got same measurement each time no problem. Works well in reverse when needed, I'm verry happy!
customer_reviews.author: Reviews4U

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The item is very accurate. Although, if you want to run a course verses walk, its a little awkward as it leans heavily to the side of the counter. The wheels should be rounded and not flat. Thats my second beef. Over all, it's light, accurate and the kick stand/counter can be enabled by using your foot. That's a cool aspect of the product. I also like how you can make it compact by shrinking down the handle.
customer_reviews.author: raybfree

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This measuring wheel is a great buy for the price. I was a little worried after reading other reviews that complained about the wheel stand and how it gets in the way when measuring. What nobody tells you is that the stand is spring load and easily folds up when measuring. With the stand up, there is absolutely no problem measuring. When you need to stop, simply use your foot or hand and pop the stand back down. Its not made to use while the stand is down....that's why its spring loaded to easily move up and down. You have to wonder about some people. This is a great tool for a great price. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matskee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wheel with stand
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wheel for laying out utilities and boundry marking/locating. Most of the use has been gravel roads, woods, and some thick brush use. The whell is excellent for all but the thick brush use. The stand is most handy allowing me to stop and note my map or survey, was even able to use it on a hilly lot the other day and the stand still worked well. Also of note is the handle which is collapsable for storage and height adjustable (I'm 5'10 maybe 6ft in boots and it was comfortable). All and all an excellent whell and a steal thru Amazon at around $50.
customer_reviews.author: So Many Tools

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love this measuring wheel. I am a true gadget person and really wanted to get a measuring wheel that was digital, but decided to get this one instead after reading some other reviews. I am glad I chose this one. You don't have to worry about batteries or changing settings. It simple and to the point and sometimes that is best. Last week I did a commercial inspection at an apartment complex in Michigan and it was very cold and snowy. This wheel went right through the snow and the only button I had to press was the reset button.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Thornberry

customer_reviews.title: The clips that keep the shaft in place will wear out
customer_reviews.text: As a fence contractor i heavily rely on my tools as well as quality measuring device. the clips that hold the shaft has worn out in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: the big wheel goes over humps and bumps pretty well. Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. If you need to measure long property lines, driveways, roads, the big wheel goes over humps and bumps pretty well. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: B K

customer_reviews.title: Keson
customer_reviews.text: This Roadrunner is amazing.. lightweight.. easy is just not the word, it couldnt be any easier.. My hubby loves this, easy reset and a 4 digit counter... he could literally measure every road he desires and he still wont get tired of this easy peazie product.. nice and durable as well, I would highly recommend this product.. I even like and I am a women, its fun and easy.. love this product.. 5 plus for sure..
customer_reviews.author: fastbuy

customer_reviews.title: works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: No more measuring tapes for me. what a pain that was. This is accurate as can be.
customer_reviews.author: German-American International School

customer_reviews.title: used to measure 2 miles, and other distances
customer_reviews.text: I always get stationed in different places not near a military base, so finding a track that we can use without paying for (highschool tracks charge for outside use to other organizations... even the military) for our physical fitness tests... this lets us use public roads, parks, bike/running paths and other areas and get an accurate reading on the start to finish point of any distance we choose to run!
customer_reviews.author: MisterMistofoles

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 0.0 stars if I could give it to them. I ask for a wheel that would measure in meters they keep sending me a wheel that measured in feet and inches. Not once but twice.... Even after asking for a specific piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: JSuperHen357

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to those other guys
customer_reviews.text: I was almost dissuaded from buying this measuring wheel by reviews stating that it wasn't accurate at long distances. One review says that it is a few feet off at 200', and they know this because they checked with a 200' tape measure. After considering their test for accuracy I realized an important detailed that was over looked in their test. The wheel will include ever bump and change in elevation that a tape measures will not. Of course the distance measured by the wheel will be some distance longer than that measured in a straight line! This product works as it should. A great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with the wheel
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the wheel, but had one bend to the point it is unusable, and some of the others seem wobbly. For the price, I would probably just spend a little more, and get one that is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: LokiLaney

customer_reviews.title: item was to be like new but with package damaged
customer_reviews.text: Some what dissappointed, item was to be like new but with package damaged. The wheel is bent pretty badly. I wouldn't have classified this as like new. I realize I received it at a bit of a discount, but only a few dollars less than a brand new piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: A great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This measuring wheel works great and is such a huge help when measuring large areas.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sue Larson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Keson for years & never had any problems - good measuring wheel as always
customer_reviews.author: Carmdava88

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, fun to use
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've used this product to see how far I'm running at the local park, and it seems extremely accurate and durable. The kickstand is a great feature, and I love how the counter will decrease as I move the wheel backward. Measures precisely in one-inch increments. Wheel is sturdy, and handle is adjustable. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge F.

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: This wheel replaced a few different digital ones that all went nuts and lost their accuracy completely within a few months of ordering them. The Keson has an analog counter which is way easier to deal with than the digital ones where I was always accidentally switching it from feet to meters, putting it on hold & so on. The little kickstand is a great feature and makes it much easier to stop and make notes while measuring than having to set it down, stick it under your arm, or squeeze it between your knees in order to free up your hands. It barely takes any effort to flick the stand up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Keson RR318N 3-foot RoadRunner Measuring Wheel review
customer_reviews.text: Unit is lightweight, counter tracks forwards and backwards. The sectional handle provided better flexibility for height. one minor fault is that if you push the unit too quickly because it is light in weight the counter will not track. Otherwise pleased with unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: myque

customer_reviews.title: Works great for measuring out spaces for the Blaine Festival this ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for measuring out spaces for the Blaine Festival this year. I would highly recommend this for anyone that does lots of measuring.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: for the money i can't imagine being able to find another wheel as good as this one. i like the telescoping handle and appears to be pretty acurate for our use around the farm settings up posts for fence lines
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Lou Art Works
customer_reviews.text: Received the Road Runner 4 days after ordering. Removed from shipping box and it was ready to go. No assembly required. To check calibration, found .25 short on 422.42 foot surveyor chained distance over a smooth surface and .3 foot long over a 519.84 foot chained grassy surface. Expect to be able to use it over the 10,000 foot distance using the accuracy caveat 'more or less' to mean the variance is under one foot. Have found the kick down stand very handy and the telescoping handle easy to use. Art
customer_reviews.author: Arthur E. Whitson

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done. But didn't last very long ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done. But didn't last very long with daily use. After 6 months the clips that hold the handle extended started wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: I have to run two miles for time and needed ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to run two miles for time and needed to measure it out. The counter does not turn after about 1/4 mile.
customer_reviews.author: JeepRubi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store and use. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Handle fails
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done; but the handle clamps are already failing a year later and the handle will not stay extended when pushing it over turf.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L. Gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: just what i needed to measure course for my cross country team
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: HANDY TOOL
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo handy. Works well for short distances as well as measuring out hay fields. Easy to use... forward as well as back. The stand helps when stopping to write down measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Heard

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: Accurate. Makes measuring long distances easier. Occasionally does not register so you need to check it as you start to make sure it is going. It is rugged. Money is well worth avoiding a hand full of dog poop when your measuring tape retracts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: STURDY, EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: NOT AS EASY TO USE AS MY LAST WHEEL WHICH HAD A DIGITAL READ-OUT ON THE HANDLE, BUT STURDY & PRETTY ACCURATE. IT ALSO CLEANS UP EASILY AFTER USING IN RAIN/MUDDY AREAS.
customer_reviews.author: JANNZZEE

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This wheel holds up very well in various terrains. I tired a small wheel that I purchased from one of the big box stores and that one kept falling apart, plus had a tendency to swerve. This wheel is a lot easier to maneuver and keeps a good straight line. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nortron5k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much but performed flawlessly when we did.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G Tudisco

customer_reviews.title: Broken too early
customer_reviews.text: I use this to measure land, buildings & bins. I have used it twice on the second time it was broke so I had to roll the wheel around to get it to zero. I travel long distances and can't have equipment failure. I needed this for occasional use. I took it apart and it was just broke.
customer_reviews.author: Short fat guy..

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't given me any problems and have had for over ...
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't given me any problems and have had for over a year. I use for estimating exterior paint jobs at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: Great measuring wheel. Small enough to keep in the truck all the time, but big enough to roll over rough terrain, clods, tractor tracks, etc. Use it often for irrigation layout and row measuring.
customer_reviews.author: The Man You GoTo

customer_reviews.title: It works as its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say? It works. The telescope handle is nice. May still be too short for tall people like 6 feet. I'm a runner and able to measure 1/4, 1/2, and 1 mile routes for my workouts. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: K. Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes measuring out anything big super easy. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Ideal!
customer_reviews.text: This is light, collapsable, and accurate! I have no professional need for this, but I use it out of curiosity. It was a good deal and I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Skywatcher

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good value
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, and collapses into a manageable size to throw in trunk.
customer_reviews.author: dlh

customer_reviews.title: does the job at a good price
customer_reviews.text: has only seen light use, but in an area with high weeds and no problems
customer_reviews.author: DCC

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: For this size wheel/unit, this was the best value and bang for the buck. It performs just as well as my more expensive wheels! Will buy another one when I need it
customer_reviews.author: Sprink1es

customer_reviews.title: It works really well and folds up for easy storing in my car
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well made. I bought it from the other reviews that I saw on line and it measures just fine. Nice big wheel to go over typical yards for measuring gutters and siding.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product at a great price. We use it to measure sq ft of properties, it's very accurate and light weight. I love the kick stand it makes writing on estimates and talking to customers so much for efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Petti

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is fine, it does the job. The stand does get in the way, and catches on almost every thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice touch having the handy stand. When measuring, just stop and use the stand to have both hands free. Large numerals, able to fold-up to fit in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gee

customer_reviews.title: This was a great working measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: This was a great working measuring wheel. But, like every other measuring wheel I have used (all day, daily, for work), it stopped working consistently and I could no longer trust that it was measuring correctly because at times the counter would stop turning. That said, it did seem to last longer than the other measuring wheels I have used, which is why I gave it 4 stars. I have since switched to using laser measurer so I don't have to worry about mechanical problems any more.
customer_reviews.author: Thisbytez

customer_reviews.title: Inacurate
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased 7 of these wheels. After a couple of weeks several of these are no longer accurate. One of the most inaccurate loses 2 feet for every 60 feet measured. This inaccuracy caused over a day and a half of paperwork to fix. If you own one of these, I recommend you check it against a tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: hoodwink

customer_reviews.title: BEATS A TAPE
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GOOD, NICE THAT IT STANDS ON ITS OWN. WORKS ON ROUGH SURFACES. BEATS HAVING TO ROLL AND RETRIEVE A TAPE.
customer_reviews.author: toomanyzzzzs

customer_reviews.title: RoadRunner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, not highest end, but what I expected and does the job. I purchased it from the Amazon warehouse, I presume it was a returned item. I was concerned about the condition it was described "like new" and I was pleasantly surprised that it in fact looks and works as if it is new.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked good  but...
customer_reviews.text: The thing worked great for a while. But if you are going to use it where dust is (a farm, etc), after a short time the counter reset becomes hard to reset to zero. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Churchguy

customer_reviews.title: Wheel of time!
customer_reviews.text: I sure do like this wheel!! Had a smaller style and it was "ok" but just doesn't do the job. This wheel is SOOOOOO much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred C.

customer_reviews.title: it is easily stored in my truck's tool box
customer_reviews.text: it is compact, it is easily stored in my truck's tool box. Easy to read, reset and the stand is right handy when I need to stop and write some notes.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent measurer
customer_reviews.text: I bought three weeks ago and since I received the product I am using it every day without problem. It is light and resistant, accurate and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Jose German-Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Best tape wheel
customer_reviews.text: Well made, no hassle warranty, one of the best deals out there for your money, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Runtich

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: STANDS UP TO ABUSE AND THE DISTANCE COUNTER LASTS A LONG TIME. WISH THE HANDLE WAS ROUND INSTEAD OF SQUARE.
customer_reviews.author: thomas yentsch

customer_reviews.title: Stop working 1/2way through the first job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to set up a floor plan and I didn't get half way finished before it wouldn't zero out. Please don't purchase this if you want to measure more than a couple of times. Really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Keson RR3M Road Runner Outdoor/Long-Run Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Received item on time and in good condition. It is functional and has met my expectations. Overall, I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ndubueze Chuku

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Keson RR318N measuring wheel for a fraction of the cost of similar wheels - most 3-foot wheels start around $90. I couldn't be happier with the wheel. The stand is a convenient feature, allowing me to stop mid-measurement to take notes in the field. The wheel is well-constructed and rolls smoothly over even rough surfaces. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RSL

customer_reviews.title: I love this measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: I'm a free wheelin' momma with this beauty. I love this measuring wheel. The magnifier over the numbers, the kick stand and the longer handle make using this wheel convenient and enjoyable. Who wants to be a hunchback using those other wheels with short handles? Pay the extra to be able to stand up straight. I'd buy this 10x over. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Keson RR410 Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Device measures distances accurately. I removed stand that would hang up in brush. Smooth surfaces would be no problem. Extending handle required retightening.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Packable
customer_reviews.text: We travel extensively for our work, including airlines. This fits in the carry on - if you only take a few clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wheel works!
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived promptly and is exactly what I expected. It works as anticipated. I have used it without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: L.G> Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Measuring Wheel Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Have used this measuring wheel several times now and it works well. The distance seems to be pretty accurate as I have checked it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: D. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought one of these years ago! It is totally accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrye L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it is a great time saver and seems to be accurate. I would recommend it to anyone who needs a quick and easy measurement in large areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This product does what I expected it to do. So far it has held up quite nicely. Price and delivery time were great.
customer_reviews.author: Stan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Keson RR318N 3-foot RoadRunner Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Item was as advertised and arrived without a hitch. Works great and has been an asset for measuring around properth. Would definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and it's well constructed. I was hoping that the handle would be longer but it also makes it easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Munera

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: decent quality better than a lot of other ones I have used/bought
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod Beeblebrox

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was purchase for one of our field employee's he said it work very well
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. Compact periscope handle. Kick stand works well. Great for long range measuring. Rolls smoothly over rough surfaces. I would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: N. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Saves a lot of time!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the landscaping business and do a lot of measuring. It's so important to get the sq. ft right when using fertilizers. I could say using this product helped my business a hundred-fold. Would I recommend this RoadRunner Measuring wheel? YES for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have rough field tech's that don't take much care for their equipment so they use and abuse so far has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Keson Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Customer very satisfied with this product, Has made multiple purchases because of it's high quality. Will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: RKD

customer_reviews.title: Keson RoadRunner Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I received the wheel as promised and was able to use it immediately. It is a very pratical tool for measuring long lenghts, is quite accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: qpatch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and I really like the telescoping handle for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good tool.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice. I'm pretty sure I'll use it Looks like it's made of good quality. by USA.
customer_reviews.author: jeff davis

customer_reviews.title: A Measure of Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Easy to store, handle and use. Wonder how I got along without it before!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Preaty nice product very useful for what it designeded for
customer_reviews.author: yehuda trabelssi

customer_reviews.title: This is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: High quality, accurate, easy to use, durable, compact. Some reviewers complain about the stand being in the way but it is handy and very practical; take it off if you don't like it. I can't imagine there being a better, more convenient measuring wheel, and at such a low price, and free shipping. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: A Long-time Prime Person

product_meta.title: Keson RR318N Contractor Grade Measuring Wheel, Ft. & In., Ft. & In., 12-1/2-Inch Diameter, Orange, Large - Circumference: 3 ft
product_meta.description:
Size:Large - Circumference: 3 ft| Style:Units: ft., in.; Diameter: 12-1/2 in.Over 20 years of continuous improvement — such as the new wheel design, kickstand and safety reflector. Extremely popular — tens of thousands sold every year. The reset on the unit housing is reinforced to protect the unit hen using feet. Heavy-duty polycast wheel has clean three-spoke design.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Whether you're measuring backyards for fencing or unpaved roads for a future highway, the Keson 3-foot RoadRunner is a perennial best seller thanks to its reliability and versatility. Precision molded out of impact-resistant ABS, the RR318N is proudly built in the U.S.A. and is designed for years of use. Its pistol-like rubberized grip allows for a sure hold and effortless steering when measuring, which in combination with the telescoping handle for adjustable height eases user fatigue and improves accuracy. The RR318N is even ideal for use on curved surfaces or uneven ground. The magnifying lens above the five-digit counter increases their size for easier reading and measuring. It’s backed by a limited lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Pistol Grip Handle increases control and comfort
Quick Snap Cam Locks to store and transport the wheel with minimal effort
Telescopes down to 23 inches cam locks make the unit simple to operate when preparing for storage
Flip-Down Kickstand keeps the wheel upright when you need your hands free to perform other tasks
Easy-to-read, Magnified Counter 5-digit, easy-read, magnified counter measures 9,999 feet, 11 inches.
Heavy-duty, 3-foot, precision-molded plastic wheel takes years of field abuse
Measures almost two miles without resetting
Curved, telescoping handle adjusts to comfort level
Time-proven designs with more than a dozen years of continuous improvement
Five-digit easy-read magnified counter (9,999 feet) subtracts in reverse

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
